name: elementsnap
description: A framework-agnostic vanilla TypeScript library that captures selected elements with element info and allows adding prompts for AI assistance

scripts.build:extension: npm run build:extension:content && npm run build:extension:popup
scripts.build:extension:content: tsup src/content.ts --format iife --global-name ElementSnapContent --out-dir . --no-splitting && mv content.global.js content.js
scripts.build:extension:popup: tsup src/popup.ts --format iife --out-dir . --no-splitting && mv popup.global.js popup.js
